text: A man has revealed he was left butt - less after surviving having a malignant bone tumor that grew inside his pelvic area removed. In a preview clip for Wednesday night's episode of the E! series Botched, Tristan meets with plastic surgeons Dr. Terry Dubrow and Dr. Paul Nassif, and they are stunned when they see photos of his bare backside.'Oh my God, the butt's gone!'Dr. Nassif says, while a baffled Dr. Dubrow stresses that the purpose of the padding on the buttocks is to allow people to comfortably sit down without putting direct pressure on their pelvic bones.
